title: Maldives plunges deeper into political turmoil
text:
Maldives plunges deeper into political turmoil 9:45am GMT - 01:41 
Maldives President Abdulla Yameen on Monday declared a state of emergency, ordered security forces into the supreme court and arrested a former president, in moves the opposition called a ''purge'' in the Indian Ocean island nation. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Maldives President Abdulla Yameen on Monday declared a state of emergency, ordered security forces into the supreme court and arrested a former president, in moves the opposition called a "purge" in the Indian Ocean island nation.
